questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva were of short stature and had bodies that appeared to be like those of _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 (translation) | QUOTE: '...their bodies appeared to be like those of sharks, blackish and yellowish.'

questions.question: Vīrabhadra took the head and with great anger threw it into the southern side of the _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra then took the head and with great anger threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire...'

questions.question: The personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead was prepared to execute the orders of _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.5 (translation) | QUOTE: '...the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, and he was prepared to execute the orders of Lord Śiva.'

questions.question: Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested Bhṛgu Muni...'

questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva created disturbances in the _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 (translation) | QUOTE: 'They ran all around the sacrificial arena and thus began to create disturbances.'

questions.question: Vīrabhadra, the black demon, arrested _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra, the black demon, arrested Prajāpati Dakṣa.'

questions.question: The dust storm was not caused by _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.8 (translation) | QUOTE: 'There is no wind blowing, and no cows are passing...'

questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva departed for their master's _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 (translation) | QUOTE: '...they departed for their master's abode, Kailāsa.'

questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva were equipped with various kinds of _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 (translation) | QUOTE: '...they were equipped with various kinds of weapons...'

questions.question: The personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead circumambulated _____.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.5 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Thus, considering himself capable of coping with any power offered against him, he circumambulated Lord Śiva.'
